verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after נִבְנְתָה֙ <WH1129> was built הַחוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> Now it came to pass when the wall וָאַעֲמִ֖יד <WH5975> and I had set up הַדְּלָת֑וֹת <WH1817> the doors וַיִּפָּ֥קְד֛וּ <WH6485> were appointed הַשּׁוֹעֲרִ֥ים <WH7778> and the porters וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִ֖ים <WH7891> and the singers וְהַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> and the Levites

וָאֲצַוֶּ֞ה <WH6680> charge אֶת־ <WH853> חֲנָ֣נִי <WH2607> Hanani אָחִ֗י <WH251> That I gave my brother וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲנַנְיָ֛ה <WH2608> and Hananiah שַׂ֥ר <WH8269> the ruler הַבִּירָ֖ה <WH1002> of the palace עַל־ <WH5921> charge יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> over Jerusalem כִּי־ <WH3588> for הוּא֙ <WH1931> he כְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> for he [was] a faithful וְיָרֵ֥א <WH3372> and feared אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God מֵרַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> above many

[וַיֹּאמֶר כ] (וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> answer ק) לָהֶ֗ם לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִפָּֽתְח֞וּ <WH6605> be opened שַׁעֲרֵ֤י <WH8179> unto them Let not the gates יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> of Jerusalem עַד־ <WH5704> until חֹ֣ם <WH2527> be hot הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> until the sun וְעַ֨ד <WH5704> and while הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they עֹמְדִ֛ים <WH5975> and while they stand by יָגִ֥יפוּ <WH1479> let them shut הַדְּלָת֖וֹת <WH1817> the doors וֶאֱחֹ֑זוּ <WH270> and bar וְהַעֲמֵ֗יד <WH5975> [them] and appoint מִשְׁמְרוֹת֙ <WH4931> watches יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> every one בְּמִשְׁמָר֔וֹ <WH4929> in his watch וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> and every one נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> front בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> [to be] over against his house

וְהָעִ֞יר <WH5892> Now the city רַחֲבַ֤ת <WH7342> broad יָדַ֙יִם֙ <WH3027> able וּגְדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> and great וְהָעָ֥ם <WH5971> but the people מְעַ֖ט <WH4592> [were] few בְּתוֹכָ֑הּ <WH8432> therein וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> else בָּתִּ֖ים <WH1004> and the houses בְּנוּיִֽם׃ <WH1129> [were] not builded

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> put אֱלֹהַי֙ <WH430> And my God אֶל־ <WH413> into לִבִּ֔י <WH3820> into mine heart וָאֶקְבְּצָ֞ה <WH6908> to gather together אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֹרִ֧ים <WH2715> the nobles וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַסְּגָנִ֛ים <WH5461> and the rulers וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and the people לְהִתְיַחֵ֑שׂ <WH3187> that they might be reckoned by genealogy וָֽאֶמְצָ֗א <WH4672> And I found סֵ֤פֶר <WH5612> a register הַיַּ֙חַשׂ֙ <WH3188> of the genealogy הָעוֹלִ֣ים <WH5927> of them which came up בָּרִאשׁוֹנָ֔ה <WH7223> at the first וָאֶמְצָ֖א <WH4672> and found כָּת֥וּב <WH3789> written בּֽוֹ׃ פ

אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> These [are] the children הַמְּדִינָ֗ה <WH4082> of the province הָעֹלִים֙ <WH5927> that went up מִשְּׁבִ֣י <WH7628> out of the captivity הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> of those that had been carried away אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom הֶגְלָ֔ה <WH1540> had carried away נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֖ר <WH5019> whom Nebuchadnezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> of Babylon וַיָּשׁ֧וּבוּ <WH7725> and came again לִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem וְלִיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> and to Judah אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one לְעִירֽוֹ׃ <WH5892> unto his city

הַבָּאִ֣ים <WH935> Who came עִם־ <WH5973> with זְרֻבָּבֶ֗ל <WH2216> with Zerubbabel יֵשׁ֡וּעַ <WH3442> Jeshua נְחֶמְיָ֡ה <WH5166> Nehemiah עֲ֠זַרְיָה <WH5838> Azariah רַֽעַמְיָ֨ה <WH7485> Raamiah נַחֲמָ֜נִי <WH5167> Nahamani מָרְדֳּכַ֥י <WH4782> Mordecai בִּלְשָׁ֛ן <WH1114> Bilshan מִסְפֶּ֥רֶת <WH4559> Mispereth בִּגְוַ֖י <WH902> Bigvai נְח֣וּם <WH5149> Nehum בַּעֲנָ֑ה <WH1196> Baanah מִסְפַּ֕ר <WH4557> The number אַנְשֵׁ֖י <WH376> of men עַ֥ם <WH5971> of the people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children פַרְעֹ֔שׁ <WH6551> of Parosh אַלְפַּ֕יִם <WH505> thousand מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> two ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <WH8203> of Shephatiah שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children אָרַ֔ח <WH733> of Arah שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס

בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> The children פַחַ֥ת מוֹאָ֛ב <WH6355> of Pahathmoab לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יֵשׁ֖וּעַ <WH3442> of Jeshua וְיוֹאָ֑ב <WH3097> and Joab אַלְפַּ֕יִם <WH505> two thousand וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> and eight מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שְׁמֹנָ֥ה <WH8083> eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> teen ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children עֵילָ֔ם <WH5867> of Elam אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> two hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> and four ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children זַתּ֔וּא <WH2240> of Zattu שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> eight מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> and five ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children זַכָּ֔י <WH2140> of Zaccai שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְשִׁשִּֽׁים׃ <WH8346> and threescore ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children בִנּ֔וּי <WH1131> of Binnui שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> and eight ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children בֵבָ֔י <WH893> of Bebai שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> and eight ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children עַזְגָּ֔ד <WH5803> of Azgad אַלְפַּ֕יִם <WH505> thousand שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> two ס
בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> The children אֲדֹ֣נִיקָ֔ם <WH140> of Adonikam שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> threescore וְשִׁבְעָֽה׃ <WH7651> and seven ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children בִגְוָ֔י <WH902> of Bigvai אַלְפַּ֖יִם <WH505> two thousand שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> threescore וְשִׁבְעָֽה׃ <WH7651> and seven ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children עָדִ֔ין <WH5720> of Adin שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> and five ס
בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> The children אָטֵ֥ר <WH333> of Ater לְחִזְקִיָּ֖ה <WH2396> of Hezekiah תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <WH8673> ninety וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> and eight ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children חָשֻׁ֔ם <WH2828> of Hashum שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> and eight ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children בֵצָ֔י <WH1209> of Bezai שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> and four ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children חָרִ֔יף <WH2756> of Hariph מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> ten ס
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The children גִבְע֖וֹן <WH1391> of Gibeon תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <WH8673> ninety וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> and five ס
אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH582> The men בֵֽית־ לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH1035> of Bethlehem וּנְטֹפָ֔ה <WH5199> and Netophah מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred שְׁמֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> fourscore וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> and eight ס
אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> of עֲנָת֔וֹת <WH6068> of Anathoth מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> and eight ס
אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> he בֵית־ עַזְמָ֖וֶת <WH1041> of Bethazmaveth אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס

אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> he קִרְיַ֤ת יְעָרִים֙ <WH7157> of Kirjathjearim כְּפִירָ֣ה <WH3716> Chephirah וּבְאֵר֔וֹת <WH881> and Beeroth שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> and three ס
אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> of הָֽרָמָה֙ <WH7414> of Ramah וָגָ֔בַע <WH1387> and Geba שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וְאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> and one ס
אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> of מִכְמָ֔ס <WH4363> of Michmas מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס
אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> he בֵֽית־ אֵל֙ <WH1008> of Bethel וְהָעָ֔י <WH5857> and Ai מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> and three ס
אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> he נְב֛וֹ <WH5015> Nebo אַחֵ֖ר <WH312> of the other חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס
בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> The children עֵילָ֣ם <WH5867> Elam אַחֵ֔ר <WH312> of the other אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> two hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> and four ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children חָרִ֔ם <WH2766> of Harim שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> and twenty ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children יְרֵח֔וֹ <WH3405> of Jericho שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> and five ס

בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The children לֹד֙ <WH3850> of Lod חָדִ֣יד <WH2307> Hadid וְאוֹנ֔וֹ <WH207> and Ono שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וְאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> and one ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children סְנָאָ֔ה <WH5570> of Senaah שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> three אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand תְּשַׁ֥ע <WH8672> nine מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וּשְׁלֹשִֽׁים׃ <WH7970> and thirty פ

הַֽכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> The priests בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> the children יְדַֽעְיָה֙ <WH3048> of Jedaiah לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יֵשׁ֔וּעַ <WH3442> of Jeshua תְּשַׁ֥ע <WH8672> nine מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> and three ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children אִמֵּ֔ר <WH564> of Immer אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> a thousand חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> and two ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children פַשְׁח֔וּר <WH6583> of Pashur אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> two hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וְשִׁבְעָֽה׃ <WH7651> and seven ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The children חָרִ֔ם <WH2766> of Harim אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> a thousand שִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> seven עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> teen פ

הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> The Levites בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יֵשׁ֧וּעַ <WH3442> of Jeshua לְקַדְמִיאֵ֛ל <WH6934> of Kadmiel לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> [and] of the children לְהוֹדְוָ֖ה <WH1937> of Hodevah שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> and four ס
הַֽמְשֹׁרְרִ֑ים <WH7891> The singers בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children אָסָ֔ף <WH623> of Asaph מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> and eight ס

הַשֹּֽׁעֲרִ֗ים <WH7778> The porters בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children שַׁלּ֤וּם <WH7967> of Shallum בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children אָטֵר֙ <WH333> of Ater בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children טַלְמֹ֣ן <WH2929> of Talmon בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children עַקּ֔וּב <WH6126> of Akkub בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children חֲטִיטָ֖א <WH2410> of Hatita בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children שֹׁבָ֑י <WH7630> of Shobai מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> an hundred שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> thirty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> and eight ס

הַנְּתִינִ֑ים <WH5411> The Nethinims בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children צִחָ֥א <WH6727> of Ziha בְנֵי־ <WH1121> the children חֲשֻׂפָ֖א <WH2817> of Hashupha בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children טַבָּעֽוֹת׃ <WH2884> of Tabbaoth
